system.description:
Your Companions are Threats, and follow the Threat rules instead of the Companion rules. They make Cuts and they do not roll dice. You control them instead of the Framework.

When a threat successfully harms the fellowship and survives the scene, you may @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.bond-moves.Item.28gRsLA4GNORvwg6]{Forge a Bond} with them.

When you need more minions, you may damage a stat to recruit a Threat and @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.bond-moves.Item.28gRsLA4GNORvwg6]{Forge a Bond} with them. You can only recruit a Threat that is controlled by the current Framework (ie, from the Overlord's Army, from the Horizon's current Location, or from the Empire's Barracks).

If the Framework is the Empire, you are a Leader, and you have one Leadership Move of your choice (Book 3, pg 138).

Write your Leadership Move here:

This Move cannot be Shared.
